text: The men's 4x400 metres relay event at the 2002 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Kingston, Jamaica, at National Stadium on 20 and 21 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Kenneth Ferguson Darold Williamson Ashton Collins Jonathan Fortenberry ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Sékou Clarke Usain Bolt Jermaine Myers Jermaine Gonzales ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Fujio Yamauchi Daisuke Sakai Yuki Yamaguchi Yosuke Inoue ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 21 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! title: 2002 World Junior Championships in Athletics – Men's 4 × 400 metres relay
